## **Problem 1**
#### **Part a**:
```{r}
library(car)
salaries.lm <- lm(salary~., data=Salaries)
```

#### **Part b**: 
```{r}
summary(salaries.lm)
```

<br>

## **Problem 2**: Adjusted R^2 value is a tiny bit lower but also certain values became less significant (years since phd and years of service).
```{r}
salaries.lm2 <- lm(salary~.-sex, data=Salaries)
summary(salaries.lm2)
```

<br>

## **Problem 3**
```{r}
newx <- data.frame(rank=c("AsstProf"), discipline=c("B"), yrs.since.phd=8, yrs.service=6, sex="Female")
predict(salaries.lm, newx, interval="prediction")
predict(salaries.lm2, newx, interval="prediction")
```
